description:
There are a gazillion ways to build a website. Sometimes having so many options can feel overwhelming. With this course I will walk you step by step through the entire process of creating a gorgeous and professional author website from scratch. I will show you the steps I used to build over 20 websites for myself and my friends who are authors. It will be as easy as following along to build yours. I did all the trial and error for you ahead of time. I'll make all the tough decision for you and show you the quickest and easiest path to success!

What is Strikingly?

The easiest and most cost-effective way to build a website is to use a platform. Strikingly is a template-based website platform that I use and recommend because of it's ease-of-use, beautiful templates, built-in author tools, and automatic responsive design (which is a fancy way of saying your website will look good on smart phones, tablets and desktop screens).

You can sign up for the Strikingly free trial while you complete this course. If you're happy with your website you can either keep using your free site (with a strikingly domain) sign up for one of their affordable accounts, and customize your domain. When you upgrade you also get a few more great features. I have done my research (pulled my hair out creating wordpress websites that didn't work, spent lots of money hiring web designers that didn't deliver) and Strikingly has very affordable and comparable pricing plans relative to competitors.

Course Content Overview

This is a step by step course. I want you to succeed, take action and get your author website up in a day. Some folks have done it in less than an hour! Follow the course videos in order from start to finish so you'll be able to set up your Strikingly site, add pages, create a blog, a book sales page, and a email list.

Every step you need to create a fully functional website is covered in this course.

Who is this course for?

If you want a gorgeous and professional author or writer website, this course if for you. A typical author website includes multiple pages (Home, About, Contact) as well as an optional blog.

This course and Strikingly is great for:

  • Authors (Non-fiction and Fiction)
  • Writers
  • Bloggers
  • Publishers
  • Promoting a new book
  • Promoting a book tour

What are the requirements?

  • A Strikingly account is required to complete the course. But you can use a free account to get started.

What am I going to get from this course?

  • Step by step video tutorials
  • Build your own great looking and fully functional website
  • Add and modify pages and content
  • A place to sell your book/books
  • Start a blog
  • Modify and customize the fonts and colors on your website
  • Start an email list to connect with your readers

What is the target audience?

  • This is a course for website beginners. If you can click on a browser you can create your website. No code or prior website experience necessary
  • Strikingly is particularly good for bloggers, writers, authors, publishers, and promoters of new books or book tours. .
  • This tutorial may not be well suited for folks that need a complicated website (i.e. membership site). If that's what you need, I would suggest hiring a professional web developer.
title: Create a Gorgeous Author Website in One Day
